reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson explains complex concepts in a way that's easy to understand. Her lectures are well-structured, but the exams are quite challenging.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is an excellent professor! He makes math fun and engaging. The homework assignments are tough, but they really help with understanding the material.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is knowledgeable but tends to go off-topic during lectures. The grading is fair, but participation is key to doing well in her class.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's lectures are hard to follow, and he doesn't seem very approachable. The lab sessions, however, are well-organized and helpful.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. White is passionate about literature and it shows in her teaching. Her feedback on essays is thorough and constructive. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson provides a lot of context to historical events, making his classes very interesting. His exams are fair but require a good grasp of the material.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez knows her subject well, but her lectures can be a bit dry. Lab work is crucial in her class, so make sure to stay on top of it.
